title: Metadata of the demo NFT collection for the game ZoneX.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT collection for the game ZoneX.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: In the heart of the battlefield, a tactical vest awaits its hero. Weathered by time and conflict, its rugged fabric bears the scars of countless encounters. The adjustable straps promise a snug fit, granting freedom of movement while ensuring vital protection. Equipped with a modular design, it boasts multiple attachment points for gear, allowing for seamless customization. This vest is more than just armor; it embodies resilience, ready to absorb the chaos of war. As you don this iconic piece, feel the weight of duty settle on your shoulders, each step echoing with the promise of survival and victory.
